parsianCargo.title: Payam Cargo
parsianCargo.description: Payam Cargo is a transportation company offering services to send and receive cargo from Iran to worldwide and vice versa.
parsianCargo.ourServicesDescription: Discover more about the services we offer
parsianCargo.contanDescription: Get in touch for more information

services.passengersDescription: We offer special services for passengers
services.freightCostDescription: Calculate the cost of shipping your cargo
services.airTransportDescription: Providing fast and secure air transport services for shipping your cargo worldwide in collaboration with reputable airlines.
services.seaTransportationDescription: Cost-effective and reliable sea transportation for large and commercial cargo using advanced fleets and international routes.
services.railTransportationDescription: Efficient and sustainable rail transport services for transferring cargo regionally and internationally with high speed and safety.
services.landTransportationDescription: Providing land transport services for fast and secure cargo movement within the country and across borders with an equipped fleet.

aboutUs.satisfactionDescription: We are committed to providing the best services to our customers
aboutUs.cooperateWithUsDescription: We are always looking for new partners to expand our services
aboutUs.licensesDescription: We hold all necessary licenses for providing transportation services

hero.slide1Description: Fast and reliable shipping with standard packaging and comprehensive safety measures to prevent damage
hero.slide2Description: Global cargo delivery in collaboration with trusted logistics companies and specialized solutions
hero.slide3Description: Handling all customs clearance stages and required documentation to expedite international shipping
hero.slide4Description: Priority shipping options for urgent deliveries with guaranteed timelines

introduction.descriptionText: With over two decades of experience in the international logistics industry, we have established ourselves as a leader in global transportation. Our comprehensive services include air, sea, land, and rail transport, ensuring the highest level of reliability and efficiency for our clients worldwide.
introduction.firstDevDescription: Operating in over 50 countries with local expertise

features.card1Description: Fast and reliable transportation services worldwide with real-time tracking capabilities.
features.card2Description: Specialized management for all types of cargo, including sensitive and high-value items.
features.card3Description: Round-the-clock support to assist with all your transportation needs.

signup.title: Sign Up for Payam Cargo
signup.termsAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our terms and conditions.

hero.trustBadge: The Most Reliable International Transport Company
hero.title: The Fastest Way to Transport
hero.subtitle: Your Cargo
hero.description: With over 15 years of experience in the air, sea, land, and rail transport industry, choose us as your business partner. We provide world-class cargo services with the highest standards.

services.title: International Transport Services
services.description: Using the most advanced air, sea, rail, and land fleets and collaborating with top international partners, we are the fastest and safest way to deliver your cargo to its destination.

express.title: Express Transport
express.description: The fastest method to transport your urgent cargo to any part of the world with complete security and in the shortest time possible.
features: Express delivery in the shortest time possible

standard.title: Standard Transport
standard.description: Cost-effective and secure transport services for your commercial cargo.

specialized.title: Specialized Cargo Transport
specialized.description: Specialized services for sensitive, perishable, and unique cargo with special handling conditions.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Us
contact.description: Our experts are ready to answer your questions and provide specialized transport consultation.

contact.addressb: Unit 27, 6th Floor, Falsafi Building, Plot 2, Falsafi Alley, Rudbar-e Sharghi St., Mirdamad, Tehran, Iran

cta.title: Ready to Provide Transport Services for You
cta.description: Expand your business and access global markets quickly with our international transport services.

whyPayamCargo.title: Why Choose Payam Cargo?
whyPayamCargo.description: We don’t just transport cargo; we are your trusted business partner in the export journey.

benefits.title: Official collaboration with reputable companies and green customs clearance
Option to charter flights and plan customized transport requests
Providing customs consultancy and handling clearance and export procedures
Speed in operations, security in transport, and transparency in services
Specialized services for exporters, industrial companies, and international traders
Door-to-door transport from origin and vice versa

cta.title: Specialized Coverage in the Middle East, Central Asia, UAE, and China
cta.description: Payam Cargo is ready to provide air, sea, land, and rail transport services for all types of cargo. Contact us, and our consultants will respond in the shortest time possible.
